comments:
Build N2003114

- create a file association for *.html with an external program
like FrontPage Express
- select a *.html file in the workspace and hit open
- an error is reported instead

Log contains:

The openMode for the file descriptor is not being set to OPEN_EXTERNAL.
Source of problem seemd to be the file association page. I suspect that
EditorRegistry.getSortedEditorsFromOS() should be doing this.

Fixed in builds > N20031115.

- Added editor.setOpenMode(OPEN_EXTERNAL) when editor descriptors are created
for OS programs (in EditorRegistry.getSortedEditorsFromOS)
- Also, improved pre-3.0 compatibility code in EditorDescriptor.load/saveValues
